resources.string: Check out the BMI table below:

Underweight (less than 18.5) 
 Healthy Weight (is 18.5 to 24.9) 
 Overweight (is 25 to 29.9) 
 Obesity I (is 30 to 34,9) 
 Obesity II (is 35 to 39,9) 
 Obesity III (40 or higher)

string.name: disclaimer
string.i: Disclaimer: The Body Mass Index is only one tool used to calculate health risk. Other factors must also be taken into consideration while assessing your health.
